    • Constructor Detail

      • Triangle

        public Triangle(int _x,
                int _y,
                int _width,
                int _height)
        Triangle - constructor ... uses Polygon constructor. The (x,y) is the location of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle. width and height are the size of the bounding rectangle. The color is BLACK. The fill flag is FALSE.
        Parameters:
        _x - the x position of the upper left corner of the enclosing square
        _y - the y position of the upper left corner of the enclosing square
        _width - the width of the enclosing square
        _height - the height of the enclosing square

      • Triangle

        public Triangle(int _x,
                int _y,
                int _width,
                int _height,
                java.awt.Color _color)
        Triangle - constructor ... uses Polygon constructor. The (x,y) is the location of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle. width and height are the size of the bounding rectangle. The color may be given. The fill flag is FALSE.
        Parameters:
        _x - the x position of the upper left corner of the enclosing square
        _y - the y position of the upper left corner of the enclosing square
        _width - the width of the enclosing square
        _height - the height of the enclosing square
        _color - the color of the triangle

      • Triangle

        public Triangle(int _x,
                int _y,
                int _width,
                int _height,
                boolean _fill)
        Triangle - constructor ... uses Polygon as superclass. The (x,y) is the location of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle. width and height are the size of the bounding rectangle. The color is BLACK. The user can specify the fill flag.
        Parameters:
        _x - the x position of the upper left corner of the enclosing square
        _y - the y position of the upper left corner of the enclosing square
        _width - the width of the enclosing square
        _height - the height of the enclosing square
        _fill - boolean fill flag for the circle ... true means draw the circle filled

      • Triangle

        public Triangle(int _x,
                int _y,
                int _width,
                int _height,
                java.awt.Color _color,
                boolean _fill)
        Triangle - constructor ... uses Polygon as superclass. The (x,y) is the location of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle. width and height are the size of the bounding rectangle. The user can specify the color. The user can specify the fill flag.
        Parameters:
        _x - the x position of the upper left corner of the enclosing square
        _y - the y position of the upper left corner of the enclosing square
        _width - the width of the enclosing square
        _height - the height of the enclosing square
        _color - the color of the triangle
        _fill - boolean fill flag for the circle ... true means draw the circle filled
